participant_1.background:
I'm the oldest, so I often feel like I need to take care of my younger siblings.
I'm having a hard time waking up in the morning, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to be spending time with my family and friends, and relaxing.
i like to play soccer.
I have two passions: challenging myself and volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop.
i m a 30 year old male.
i am the youngest sibling of four.

content.text: Hi, how's it going?
I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from a soccer game.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've been wanting to get into soccer but I've never really played before.
It's never too late to start! What's holding you back?
I'm not sure, I guess I'm just a little bit intimidated.
There's nothing to be intimidated about! Everyone starts out at the same level.
I guess you're right. I'll look into joining a local team.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what are you up to this weekend?
Not much, probably just going to relax and read a book.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to be spending time with my family and friends, and relaxing.
That sounds nice. I miss my dad a lot.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure he's proud of you, no matter what.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
No problem. So, what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mystery novels.
Oh, I love those too! I'm currently reading "The Girl on the Train".
I've heard good things about that book. I'm currently reading "The Silent Patient".
I've heard of that one too. I've been meaning to check it out.
It's really good. I'm about halfway through it and I can't put it down.
That sounds great! I'll have to add it to my list.
You should! It's a really good read.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
